member.name: T:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo
member.summary: This class holds the information needed for the calculations that appear in a Chart Grid. For each calculation seen, there is an associated ChartComputationInfo object that is added to the collection.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.GetSummaryInstance(Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ComputationType)
member.summary: Returns a object of the specified .

member.name: M:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.GetComputationTypes
member.summary: Returns a sorted list of computation names based on the enumerations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.FieldMappingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property to be used in this calculation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of the calculation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.CalculationName
member.summary: Gets or sets what is displayed in the Chart table if more than one calculation is included in the Chart Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that is used to define this calculation. This value is altomatically set when you specify any non-custom value of . If you specify SummaryType.Custom, then you are required to set Summary to be an instance of your custom SummaryBase derived object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.ComputationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the SummaryType enumeration for this calculation. Setting it to any value of than Custom will also properly set Summary.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartComputationInfo.Format
member.summary: Gets of sets the format string to be used to format this calculation results in the Chart Grid.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine
member.summary: This class encapsulates Charting calculation support. To use it, you first populate the and collections to define the properties being Charted. You then populate the collection to define the values you would like to see populated.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.SeriesFields
member.summary: Gets or set a collection of row Chart properties.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.CategoryFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of column Chart properties.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.ChartDataFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of Chart calculations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.SeriesValueFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of Chart calculations.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.EmptyChart
member.summary: Gets whether a Chart results contains any items. For example, if you apply a filter which filters out all items in the underlying data source, then this EmptyChart property will be set true. The RowCount and ColumnCount will be set to one, and the Engine[0, 0] will hold the value .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets source of data for this Chart table. This object should be either an IEnumerable list, or a DataTable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.DataSourceList
member.summary: Used internally. Gets or sets an IEnumerable list that is used as the data for the Chart table. The default behavior is to initailize this list from DataSource.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartEngine.ItemProperties
member.summary: Gets a PropertyDescriptorCollection describing the type of the underlying data item.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartItem
member.summary: Enacapulates the information needed to define a Chart item, for either a row or column Chart.
member.remarks: A Chart item is a property in the underlying data objects that is used to grouped the data in a Chart table. You can add Chart items to both the ChartColumns and ChartRows collection in a mutually exclusive manner.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartItem.FieldMappingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the property's mappingname.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartItem.FieldHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets the title you want to see in the header for this Chart item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartItem.TotalHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets the string you want appended to the Chart item's summary cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.RDL.Internal.ChartItem.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the IComparer object used for sorting. If this value is null, then sorting is done assuming this field is IComparable.

member.summary: This class is an abstract class that defines the necessary functionality to do tablix calculations.

member.summary: This is the event handler for PrintDocument.Paginate. It fires when the PrintManager requests print preview

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Reports.SfReportViewer.GetPrintPreviewPage(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Printing.GetPreviewPageEventArgs)
member.summary: This is the event handler for PrintDocument.GetPrintPreviewPage. It provides a specific print preview page, in the form of an UIElement, to an instance of PrintDocument. PrintDocument subsequently converts the UIElement into a page that the Windows print system can deal with.
member.param: Arguments containing the preview requested page

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Reports.SfReportViewer.AddPrintPages(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Printing.AddPagesEventArgs)
member.summary: This is the event handler for PrintDocument.AddPages. It provides all pages to be printed, in the form of UIElements, to an instance of PrintDocument. PrintDocument subsequently converts the UIElements into a pages that the Windows print system can deal with.
member.param: Add page event arguments containing a print task options reference

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Reports.SfReportViewer.PrintTaskRequested(Windows.Graphics.Printing.PrintManager,Windows.Graphics.Printing.PrintTaskRequestedEventArgs)
member.summary: This is the event handler for PrintManager.PrintTaskRequested.
